instructions: Place dinner plate facing up onto center of table.
Place dinner fork facing up to the left of the dinner plate.
Place the salad fork facing up to the left of the dinner fork.
Place the dinner knife, blade facing the dinner plate.
Place the salad knife, blade facing the dinner knife.
Place the soup spoon facing up to the right of the salad knife.
Place the water glass in front of the two knives.
Place the wine glass to the right of the water glass.
Place the second wine glass to the right of the first wine glass.
Place the coffee cup next to the soup spoon.
Place the bread plate in front of the forks.
Place the butter knife on top to an edge of the bread plate with knife end facing the dinner plate.
Place the dessert fork horizontal to the dinner plate, with end facing the bread plate.
Place the dessert spoon on top of the dessert fork with end facing the water glass.
Place the napkin in the center on top of the dinner plate.
